typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceipfeature
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as date,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> vistorsource
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as date,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcevisitor
source(output(
		UserID as string,
		{Signup Date} as date,
		{User Segment} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> userdatasrc
vistorsource select(mapColumn(
		VisitDateTime,
		UserID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(UserID),
	VisitDateTime = countDistinct(VisitDateTime)) ~> AggNoofdaysVisited7Days
Select1 filter(VisitDateTime>toDate("2018-05-20")) ~> Filter1
sourcevisitor select(mapColumn(
		VisitDateTime,
		ProductID,
		UserID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 filter(VisitDateTime>toDate("2018-05-12")) ~> Filter2
Filter2 aggregate(groupBy(UserID),
	No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days = countDistinct(ProductID)) ~> Aggregate1
Filter3 select(mapColumn(
		UserID,
		{Signup Date},
		{User Segment}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
userdatasrc filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter3
